hello: Welcome to our QR code generation website! Our website supports the generation of many types of QR codes, including links, contacts, Wi-Fi, email, adding calendars, addresses, text messages, phone numbers, etc.

hero.heading: A toolset powered by WebAssembly
hero.subtitle: Efficient and fast â€” can be run in modern web browsers, it is a low-level assembly-like language with a compact binary format that runs with near-native performance

intro.subtitle: VS traditional online tools or native applications
intro.body: Ditch the snail-paced online tools and permission-hungry local apps, WebAssembly lets powerful code run swiftly right inside your browser. Best of all, your data stays private and processed securely in that browser sandbox, using only the standard permissions you approve, not demanding access to your whole computer.
highlight: data stays private and processed securely

page-hash.title: Online SHA256 Calculator - Calculate SHA256 Hash Value with WebAssembly
page-hash.description: Use our online SHA256 calculator with WebAssembly to quickly calculate and generate the SHA256 hash value. SHA256 is a secure hashing algorithm that can be used to protect your data and information. With the power of WebAssembly, our tool runs efficiently in your web browser without the need for any downloads or installations. Try it now for free!
